entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
